attributes.review: dont even get me STARTED!!! i cannot fathom how disrespectful this app is, lemme tell yall🙄 i was walkin my pet fish and a nun from hell came and killed my fish and before she left she told me that 🤢tha-🤮 t-t-trump sent her.. sorry took me a second to get that horrible name out, it sickens me. anyways, if i could id give this app negative stars, he ruined my life! my pet fish was my best friend, my soul mate, my everything, he was like father to me, and he ruined it for me!😡, barron if youre seeing this im whoopin yo dad, and youll be mine soon dont worry🧚🏻💞😍☺️. anyways so then the ice age started happening around me when i opened up the app. i know it sounds ridiculous but its true! the sloth dude came outta no where and frigin started telling me about his depression, then after a few days i caught it🤕😔. i caught his depression, i took years of therapy but im still suffering😣. but all in all, this app caused my fish to die (rest in paradise goopy😢😖) and caused my chronic depression. and not only that but is trying to send me texts, i feel threatened, i dont want to know about his day! it tells me every detail😔, im horrified. honestly. it tells me everything from how he forgot to wipe the crumb off his suit after breakfast, to the fact that hes trying to ban tiktok because hes a- 💞🧚🏻😍❤️boomer🧚🏻💞🤍😍. neverr get this app, you should be ashamed if you get it and enjoy the hell that comes out of it. i wish you a short life and therapy for that.
